languages.text: {n}Власть Инквизиции велика. Возможно, что, попроси Калькасар, в Простор прибыли бы не две стаи, а весь Орден.{/n}
{n}The Inquisition wields immense power. The entire Chapter might have come to the Koronus Expanse, had Calcazar requested it.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Власть Инквизиции велика. Возможно, что, попроси Калькасар, в Простор прибыли бы не две стаи, а весь Орден.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisition wields immense power. The entire Chapter might have come to the Koronus Expanse, had Calcazar requested it.{/n}
{n}The Inquisition wields immense power. The entire Chapter might have come to the Koronus Expanse, had Calcazar requested it.{/n}
{n}The Inquisition wields immense power. The entire Chapter might have come to the Koronus Expanse, had Calcazar requested it.{/n}
{n}The Inquisition wields immense power. The entire Chapter might have come to the Koronus Expanse, had Calcazar requested it.{/n}

languages.text: {n}审判庭掌握着巨大的权力。如果是卡尔卡扎亲口提出要求，那就算整支战团来到科罗努斯扩区，也不是什么令人意外的事情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisition wields immense power. The entire Chapter might have come to the Koronus Expanse, had Calcazar requested it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}审判庭掌握着巨大的权力。如果是卡尔卡扎亲口提出要求，那就算整支战团来到科罗努斯扩区，也不是什么令人意外的事情。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El poder de la Inquisición es inmenso. De haberlo pedido Calcazar, probablemente hubiera acudido el Capítulo entero.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisition wields immense power. The entire Chapter might have come to the Koronus Expanse, had Calcazar requested it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El poder de la Inquisición es inmenso. De haberlo pedido Calcazar, probablemente hubiera acudido el Capítulo entero.{/n}

languages.text: {n}異端審問庁には絶大な力がある。カルカサルが要請すれば、戦団全体がコロヌス・エクスパンスに来たかもしれない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisition wields immense power. The entire Chapter might have come to the Koronus Expanse, had Calcazar requested it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問庁には絶大な力がある。カルカサルが要請すれば、戦団全体がコロヌス・エクスパンスに来たかもしれない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Inquisition besitzt gewaltige Macht. Vielleicht wäre der gesamte Orden in die Koronus-Ausdehnung gekommen, wenn Calcazar darum gebeten hätte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisition wields immense power. The entire Chapter might have come to the Koronus Expanse, had Calcazar requested it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Inquisition besitzt gewaltige Macht. Vielleicht wäre der gesamte Orden in die Koronus-Ausdehnung gekommen, wenn Calcazar darum gebeten hätte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'Inquisition détient un immense pouvoir. Le Chapitre tout entier aurait pu être mobilisé dans les Étendues de Koronus, si Calcazar en avait décidé ainsi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisition wields immense power. The entire Chapter might have come to the Koronus Expanse, had Calcazar requested it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'Inquisition détient un immense pouvoir. Le Chapitre tout entier aurait pu être mobilisé dans les Étendues de Koronus, si Calcazar en avait décidé ainsi.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Engizisyon çok güçlü. Calcazar isteseydi tüm Tümen, Koronus Enginliği'ne gelebilirdi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisition wields immense power. The entire Chapter might have come to the Koronus Expanse, had Calcazar requested it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Engizisyon çok güçlü. Calcazar isteseydi tüm Tümen Koronus Enginliği'ne gelebilirdi.{/n}
